articles.title: Earth has a 27.5-million-year 'pulse' of major geological events, says study - CBC.ca
articles.description: In this week's issue of our environment newsletter, we look at a new study on the 'pulses' of Earth's geological events and a Maritime company that makes Lego-style bricks made from recycled plastic.
